thread.title: Alabama principal stops students from taking grandmother to prom
thread.title_full: Alabama principal stops students from taking grandmother to prom

author: Amber Sutton | asutton@al.com
title: Alabama principal stops students from taking grandmother to prom
text: When Eufaula High School senior Bryce Maine decided to ask his grandmother to prom, he thought it would be a sweet gesture and a chance for his 'nanny' to have a new experience. Eufaula High School Principal Steve Hawkins, however, felt otherwise. While many in the community supported Maine's idea to take his grandmother to prom, Hawkins denied Catherine Maine permission to attend the event on April 8.
